document.full_text: syrian president bashar al-assad faced rare dissent within his baath party and signs of discontent in the army over violent repression of protesters that a rights group said on thursday had killed 500 people.
document.title: syria's assad facing dissent over deraa crackdown
lines_and_colors: syrian president bashar al-assad faced rare dissent within his baath party and signs of discontent in the army over violent repression of protesters that a rights group said on thursday had killed 500 people.
